title: Website Development Certificate of Completion
description: Certificate of completion for successfully developing and deploying the official school website with modern web technologies.
achievements: Successfully developed and launched the official school website serving 500+ students and staff

title: CS50's Introduction to Programming with Python
description: Completed Harvard University's introduction to programming with Python, covering fundamental programming concepts, data structures, and algorithm design.
achievements: Completed all problem sets and final project with distinction

title: HACKSAGON 2025 - Top Performer
description: HACKSAGON 2025, hosted by ABV-IIITM, Gwalior, and six IIIT partners! After clearing online ideation and video rounds, our team competed in the Smart Wearables for Safety track. We are ranked among the top performers!
achievements: SafeFit: A Smart Bracelet - Where fashion meets innovation. One-stop solution for health, fitness, and safety. Ranked among top performers with teammates Revanth Modalavalasa, Mithun Gullapalli and Abhiram Jasti.

title: HackAP Transport & Logistics - 1st Place
description: First place winner in the state-level hackathon for developing an intelligent safety helmet system for transportation and logistics sector.
achievements: 1st Prize winner among 200+ participants for innovative IoT safety solution

title: Engineering Clinics - S Grade Achievement
description: Achieved S Grade (highest grade) in Engineering Clinics for the intelligent safety helmet project demonstrating exceptional engineering skills.
achievements: S Grade achievement for innovative engineering solution
